  specialized intended to increase the amount of money that people and businesses spend: expansionary policy The government's expansionary fiscal policy has failed to stimulate the economy. Most EU member states reacted in an expansionary fashion, increasing social expenditure. As an economic stimulus budget, it was expansionary. Related word
